divs: Sighting DetailsAt round 6:00 pm,in Trenton, Ohio, I had just walked out my front door, and was at the sidewalk, when I heard a noise, like a buzzing noise, I turned and looked up, and their, I saw this very big round silver ship, fly over the house, so I run inthe house, and got my brother, from the upstair, and we both look out the window, and this thing was moving so fast, it was just a little spot in the sky. That night their where lights in the sky, and all these private planes were in the sky, try to go toward these lights, and when one would get close, the light would just go away, and when the plane past, the light would appear again, and again, this want on for hours. Check out UFO's in and round Dayton, and Middletown, Ohio 1972-1973 100's saw them. Thank you
